alarms.details: The Sprout process has been restored to normal operation.

Monit has detected that the Sprout process has failed. A restart will automatically be attempted. If this alarm does not clear, the Sprout process may have been stopped or an unrecoverable failure may have occurred.
Sprout communication to at least one Homestead has been restored.

Sprout is unable to contact any Homesteads. It will periodically attempt to reconnect. If this alarm does not clear, ensure that at least one Homestead is operational and that network connectivity exists between it and Sprout.
Sprout communication to at least one Memcached has been restored.

Sprout is unable to contact any Memcacheds. It will periodically attempt to reconnect. If this alarm does not clear, ensure that at least one Memcached is operational and that network connectivity exists between it and Sprout.

alarms.description: Sprout: Remote Memcached communication error cleared
alarms.details: Sprout communication to at least one remote Memcached has been restored.

Sprout is unable to contact any remote Memcacheds. It will periodically attempt to reconnect. If this alarm does not clear, ensure that at least one remote Memcached is operational and that network connectivity exists between it and Sprout.
Sprout communication to at least one Chronos has been restored.

Sprout is unable to contact any Chronos's. It will periodically attempt to reconnect. If this alarm does not clear, ensure that at least one Chronos is operational and that network connectivity exists between it and Sprout.
Sprout communication to at least one Ralf has been restored.

Sprout is unable to contact any Ralfs. It will periodically attempt to reconnect. If this alarm does not clear, ensure that at least one Ralf is operational and that network connectivity exists between it and Sprout.
Sprout communication to the ENUM server has been restored.

Sprout is unable to contact the ENUM server. It will periodically attempt to reconnect. If this alarm does not clear, ensure that the ENUM server is operational and that network connectivity exists between it and Sprout.

alarms.description: Sprout: Memcached vBucket communication error cleared
alarms.details: Sprout communication to Memcached for a piece of data has been restored.

Sprout is unable to contact any Memcacheds for a piece of data. Some subscriber data will be unavailable. If this alarm does not clear, ensure that all Memcacheds are operational and that network connectivity exists between them and Sprout.

alarms.description: Sprout: Memcached remote vBucket communication error cleared
alarms.details: Sprout communication to Memcached for a remote piece of data has been restored.

alarms.description: Sprout: Memcached remote vBucket communication error
alarms.details: Sprout is unable to contact any Memcacheds for a remote piece of data. Some subscriber data will be unavailable. If this alarm does not clear, ensure that all remote Memcacheds are operational and that network connectivity exists between them and Sprout.
